@apcruickshank @EnvAgency @BBOWT That looks interesting! My advice would be stick that bit in a plastic bag, take it home and pop it in a bucket by the back door and see what happens. Hippuris has that sort of habit, but I don't think that's Hippuris, I'm wondering about Ranunculus lingua, Greater Spearwort.
@SimonVyse1 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgencyAnglia There lies you lack of understanding, if the water is slowed further up the catchment area then flooding is less likely lower down!

@bbcweather @EnvAgency @NatResWales In Canada we've been joining community hands to prepare for flooding seasons, we've been using sandbags in common flood areas like Quebec, and our government has supported the facilities to help out. We've incorporated preperation ahead of time aproch  to flooding. üçÅüí´
